Fund Overview.description: Full legal name of the fund
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the complete legal name of the venture capital or private equity fund (e.g., 'Sequoia Capital Global Growth Fund III, L.P.').

Fund Overview.description: Short or marketing name of the fund
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the abbreviated name if different from legal name (e.g., 'SCGG Fund III').

Fund Overview.description: Unique fund identifier or reference number
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract any unique identifier, fund number, or internal reference code assigned to this fund.
Extract the vintage year - the year the fund began making investments (4-digit year, e.g., 2021).

Fund Overview.description: Date the fund was formally established
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the fund's inception or first closing date. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Fund Overview.description: Date of the fund's final closing
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the final closing date when fundraising was completed. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Classify the fund type: Venture Capital, Growth Equity, Buyout, Mezzanine, Secondary, Fund of Funds, etc.
Fund Overview.allowed_values: Venture Capital - Seed, Venture Capital - Early Stage, Venture Capital - Growth, Growth Equity, Buyout, Mezzanine, Distressed Debt, Secondary, Fund of Funds, Real Assets, Infrastructure

Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the fund's stated investment focus (e.g., 'Technology - Enterprise Software', 'Healthcare - Biotech', 'Consumer Internet').
Extract the geographic focus (e.g., 'Global', 'North America', 'Europe', 'Asia-Pacific', 'United States').
Extract where the fund is legally domiciled (e.g., 'Delaware, USA', 'Cayman Islands', 'Luxembourg').

Fund Overview.description: Name of the General Partner entity
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the name of the GP (General Partner) entity managing the fund.
Extract the management company or investment advisor name if different from GP.
Extract the name of the third-party fund administrator (e.g., 'SS&C', 'Apex', 'Citco').
Extract the name of the audit firm (Deloitte, PwC, EY, KPMG, etc.).
Fund Overview.allowed_values: Deloitte, PricewaterhouseCoopers, Ernst & Young, KPMG, BDO, Grant Thornton, RSM, Other

Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the target fund size that was set during fundraising.
Extract the hard cap - maximum amount the fund can raise.

Fund Overview.description: Total LP commitments to the fund
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract the total capital committed by all Limited Partners.
Extract the base currency in which the fund operates (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.).
Fund Overview.allowed_values: USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, CAD, AUD, SGD, HKD

Fund Overview.description: End date of the investment period
Fund Overview.AI-instruction: Extract when the investment period ends (typically 3-5 years from inception). Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the total fund term (typically 10-12 years). Enter as a number (e.g., 10).
Extract the annual management fee rate as a percentage (e.g., 2.0 for 2%).
Extract the carried interest rate (typically 20-30%). Express as percentage.
Extract the hurdle rate or preferred return that LPs must achieve before carry kicks in. Express as percentage.

Reporting Period Details.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.

Reporting Period Details.description: Quarter being reported (Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4)
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Extract the quarter: Q1, Q2, Q3, or Q4.
Extract the calendar year of the reporting period (4-digit year, e.g., 2024).

Reporting Period Details.description: First day of the reporting quarter
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Extract the start date of this quarter. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Reporting Period Details.description: Last day of the reporting quarter
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Extract the end date of this quarter (the 'as of' date). Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the date this report was prepared or issued to LPs. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Reporting Period Details.description: Fund age in months as of quarter end
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Calculate or extract the fund's age in months from inception to quarter end.

Reporting Period Details.description: Fund age in years as of quarter end
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Calculate or extract the fund's age in years (can be decimal, e.g., 3.5).

Reporting Period Details.description: Whether fund is still in investment period
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Determine if the fund is still in its investment period (True) or in harvest/exit mode (False).

Reporting Period Details.description: Date when portfolio valuations were performed
Reporting Period Details.AI-instruction: Extract the valuation date for portfolio holdings (usually quarter end). Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the gross IRR (before fees and carry). Express as percentage (e.g., 28.5 for 28.5%).

Fund Performance Summary.description: Net Internal Rate of Return to LPs
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the net IRR after fees and carry. Express as percentage.
Extract the gross MOIC (Total Value / Invested Capital). Express as a multiple (e.g., 2.3 for 2.3x).

Fund Performance Summary.description: Net Multiple on Invested Capital to LPs
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the net MOIC after fees and carry. Express as a multiple.
Extract TVPI = (Distributions + NAV) / Called Capital. Express as a multiple.
Extract DPI = Cumulative Distributions / Called Capital. Express as a multiple (e.g., 0.8 for 0.8x).
Extract RVPI = Current NAV / Called Capital. Express as a multiple.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Net Asset Value as of quarter end
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the total Net Asset Value of the fund as of the valuation date.
Extract the NAV per partnership unit or share if the fund has unit accounting.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Unrealized gains or losses for the quarter
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the change in unrealized value during this quarter. Positive = gain, negative = loss.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Realized gains or losses for the quarter
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the realized gains or losses from exits during this quarter.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Total number of active portfolio companies
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the total count of portfolio companies held as of quarter end.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Number of complete exits since inception
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the cumulative number of companies that have been fully exited.

Fund Performance Summary.description: Number of partial exits since inception
Fund Performance Summary.AI-instruction: Extract the count of positions that have been partially liquidated.

Capital Activity.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Capital Activity.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the total capital called from LPs during this quarter (QTD).
Extract the total capital called so far this year (YTD).
Extract the cumulative capital called from LPs since fund inception.
Calculate or extract: (Cumulative Called / Total Commitments) × 100.

Capital Activity.description: Amount invested in portfolio companies this quarter
Capital Activity.AI-instruction: Extract the total deployed into investments during this quarter.
Extract the total deployed into investments so far this year.
Extract the cumulative capital invested in portfolio companies.
Extract the total distributions paid to LPs during this quarter.
Extract the total distributions paid to LPs so far this year.
Extract the cumulative distributions paid to LPs since inception.
Calculate or extract: Total Commitments - Capital Called.
Extract the management fees charged during this quarter.
Extract the management fees charged so far this year.
Extract the cumulative management fees charged since inception.
Extract the total fund-level expenses (excluding management fees) for this quarter.
Extract the total fund expenses so far this year.

Current Investments.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Current Investments.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the name of the portfolio company. Use the legal name if available, otherwise the trading name.
Extract any unique company identifier (internal reference, LEI, registration number) used for tracking.
Extract the date of the fund's first investment in this company. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Current Investments.description: Stage at which investment was made
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Classify the investment stage: Seed, Series A, Series B, Series C+, Growth, Buyout, etc.
Current Investments.allowed_values: Seed, Pre-Series A, Series A, Series B, Series C, Series D+, Growth, Late Stage, Buyout, Secondary

Current Investments.AI-instruction: Extract or classify the company's primary sector (e.g., Enterprise SaaS, Consumer Internet, Fintech, Healthcare, Biotech).
Extract the country or region where the company is headquartered.
Identify the security type: Preferred Equity, Common Equity, Convertible Note, SAFE, Warrants, Debt, etc.
Current Investments.allowed_values: Preferred Stock, Common Stock, Convertible Preferred, Convertible Note, SAFE, Warrants, Senior Debt, Subordinated Debt, Mezzanine, Other

Current Investments.description: Total amount invested in this company
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the cumulative cost basis - total capital deployed including all rounds and follow-ons.

Current Investments.description: Current fair value as of quarter end
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the fair market value of the position as of the valuation date.

Current Investments.description: Unrealized gain or loss on position
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Calculate or extract: Current Fair Value - Total Cost Basis. Positive = gain, negative = loss.
Calculate or extract: Current Fair Value / Total Cost Basis. Express as multiple (e.g., 1.5 for 1.5x).

Current Investments.description: Position size as percentage of fund NAV
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Calculate or extract: (Current Fair Value / Fund NAV) × 100.
Extract the fund's ownership percentage in the company (fully-diluted basis preferred).

Current Investments.description: Date of most recent financing round
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the date of the company's most recent funding round. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Current Investments.description: Name of most recent financing round
Current Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the name/stage of the most recent round (e.g., 'Series C', 'Growth Round').
Extract the post-money valuation from the most recent financing round.
Extract the valuation method: Recent Transaction, Comparable Companies, DCF, Market Approach, Cost, Other.
Current Investments.allowed_values: Recent Transaction, Comparable Companies, Comparable Transactions, DCF, Market Multiple, Cost Basis, Orderly Liquidation, Other

Current Investments.AI-instruction: Determine if the fund has a board seat or observer rights (True) or not (False).
Classify the status: Active, Under Review, Distressed, Pending Exit, Other.
Current Investments.allowed_values: Active - Performing, Active - Monitoring, Under Review, Distressed, Pending Exit, Written Off

Realized Investments.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Realized Investments.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.

Realized Investments.description: Name of the exited portfolio company
Realized Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the name of the portfolio company that was exited (fully or partially).
Extract the date when this investment was first made. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the date when the exit transaction closed. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Calculate or extract the number of months between initial investment and exit.
Classify the exit: IPO, M&A/Trade Sale, Secondary Sale, Buyback, Liquidation, Write-off.
Realized Investments.allowed_values: IPO, M&A - Strategic, M&A - Financial, Secondary Sale, Management Buyback, Recapitalization, Liquidation, Write-off

Realized Investments.AI-instruction: Indicate if this was a Full Exit (100% liquidated) or Partial Exit (some position retained).
Extract or classify the company's sector.
Extract the total capital invested in this company across all rounds.
Extract the total cash proceeds received from the exit (gross of fees/expenses).
Calculate or extract: Total Proceeds - Total Cost Basis.
Calculate or extract: Total Proceeds / Total Cost Basis. Express as multiple (e.g., 3.2 for 3.2x).
Extract the internal rate of return achieved on this investment. Express as percentage.
Extract the total enterprise or equity value at which the company was sold/valued at exit.
Extract the name of the acquiring company or buyer in the transaction.

New Investments.description: Reference to the fund legal name
New Investments.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.

New Investments.description: Name of the new portfolio company
New Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the name of the company that received initial investment this quarter.
Extract the closing date of this new investment. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the total amount invested by the fund in this transaction.
Classify the stage: Seed, Series A, Series B, Series C+, Growth, etc.
New Investments.allowed_values: Seed, Pre-Series A, Series A, Series B, Series C, Series D+, Growth, Late Stage, Buyout

New Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the specific round name (e.g., 'Series B', 'Growth Round 1').

New Investments.description: Total size of the financing round
New Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the total amount raised by the company in this round (all investors).
Extract the post-money valuation of the company after this round.
Extract the pre-money valuation before this investment round.
Calculate or extract the ownership percentage acquired by the fund in this transaction.
Extract or classify the company's sector.
Extract the country or region where the company is based.

New Investments.allowed_values: Preferred Stock, Common Stock, Convertible Preferred, Convertible Note, SAFE, Warrants, Other

New Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the name of the lead investor if this fund was not the lead.
Determine if this fund was the lead investor (True) or not (False).
Extract names of other notable co-investors in this round (comma-separated if multiple).

Follow-on Investments.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Follow-on Investments.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.

Follow-on Investments.description: Name of the existing portfolio company
Follow-on Investments.AI-instruction: Extract the name of the portfolio company receiving the follow-on investment.
Extract the closing date of this follow-on investment. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the amount invested in this follow-on round.
Extract the round name (e.g., 'Series C', 'Bridge Round').
Extract the total amount raised in this financing round.
Extract the post-money valuation for this round.
Determine if the fund exercised its pro-rata rights (True) or invested above/below (False).

Follow-on Investments.description: Total investment to date including this round
Follow-on Investments.AI-instruction: Calculate or extract the cumulative amount invested after this follow-on.

Write-offs and Write-downs.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Write-offs and Write-downs.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the name of the portfolio company being written down or off.
Classify as: Full Write-off (to zero), Partial Write-down, or Impairment.
Extract the fair value of the investment before this write-down.
Extract the new fair value after the write-down (will be zero for write-offs).
Calculate or extract: Previous Value - New Value.
Extract the original cost basis of this investment.
Extract or summarize the reason: Company Failure, Liquidation, Market Conditions, etc.

Fair Value Adjustments.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Fair Value Adjustments.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the name of the company whose valuation was adjusted.

Fair Value Adjustments.description: Fair value at previous quarter end
Fair Value Adjustments.AI-instruction: Extract the fair value from the previous valuation.

Fair Value Adjustments.description: Fair value at current quarter end
Fair Value Adjustments.AI-instruction: Extract the new fair value after adjustment.
Calculate or extract: Current FV - Previous FV. Positive = markup, negative = markdown.
Calculate: ((Current FV - Previous FV) / Previous FV) × 100.

Fair Value Adjustments.description: Primary driver of the valuation change
Fair Value Adjustments.AI-instruction: Extract or classify the reason: New Financing Round, Performance Improvement, Market Conditions, etc.

LP Distribution Schedule.description: Reference to the fund legal name
LP Distribution Schedule.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the date when this distribution was made to LPs. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the total amount distributed to all LPs.
Classify: Return of Capital, Gain Distribution, Income Distribution, or Mixed.
LP Distribution Schedule.allowed_values: Return of Capital, Realized Gain, Income Distribution, Mixed, Recallable

LP Distribution Schedule.AI-instruction: Extract the name of the portfolio company whose exit generated these proceeds.

LP Distribution Schedule.description: Whether distribution is subject to recall
LP Distribution Schedule.AI-instruction: Determine if this distribution can be recalled (True) or is final (False).

Capital Call Schedule.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Capital Call Schedule.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Extract the date when this capital call was made. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
Extract the total capital called from all LPs.
Classify: Investment (new deal), Follow-on Investment, Management Fees, Fund Expenses, or Other.
Capital Call Schedule.allowed_values: New Investment, Follow-on Investment, Management Fees, Fund Expenses, Bridge Financing, Reserve, Other

Capital Call Schedule.AI-instruction: Extract the date by which LPs must fund the call. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.
If for an investment, extract the portfolio company name. Otherwise describe the purpose.

Limited Partners.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Limited Partners.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
Extract the full legal name of the Limited Partner investor.
Classify: Pension Fund, Endowment, Family Office, Fund of Funds, Corporate, Insurance, Sovereign Wealth, Individual, Other.
Limited Partners.allowed_values: Pension Fund, Endowment, Foundation, Family Office, Fund of Funds, Corporate, Insurance Company, Sovereign Wealth Fund, High Net Worth Individual, Other

Limited Partners.AI-instruction: Extract the total capital committed by this LP.
Calculate or extract: (LP Commitment / Total Fund Commitments) × 100.

Limited Partners.description: Total capital called from this LP
Limited Partners.AI-instruction: Extract the cumulative amount called from this LP since inception.
Extract the cumulative distributions paid to this LP.
Extract the country or region where the LP is based.
Extract the date when this LP committed capital. Format as DD-MM-YYYY.

Fund Expenses.description: Reference to the fund legal name
Fund Expenses.AI-instruction: This field links back to Fund Overview. Use the same fund legal name.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same quarter.
This field links back to Reporting Period Details. Use the same year.
Classify: Management Fees, Legal, Audit, Admin Fees, Due Diligence, Consulting, Travel, Other.
Fund Expenses.allowed_values: Management Fees, Legal Fees, Audit Fees, Administration Fees, Valuation Fees, Due Diligence Costs, Consulting Fees, Travel & Entertainment, Portfolio Company Fees, Other

Fund Expenses.AI-instruction: Extract a more detailed description of what this expense was for.
Extract the expense amount incurred during this quarter.

Fund Expenses.description: Whether expense is reimbursable to GP
Fund Expenses.AI-instruction: Determine if this expense was reimbursed to the GP (True) or borne by the fund directly (False).

master_instruction_config.text:
This is a venture capital or private equity fund quarterly report to Limited Partners. Focus on:

1. Capital Activity: Pay close attention to the distinction between committed capital, called capital, invested capital, and distributed capital. These are different metrics.

2. Performance Metrics: IRR and MOIC are the primary performance indicators. Be precise about whether values are gross (before fees) or net (after fees).

3. Portfolio Valuations: Fair values may change quarterly. Watch for markups, markdowns, and write-offs.

4. Investment Stages: Correctly identify whether investments are initial, follow-on, or bridge financing.

5. Time Periods: Clearly distinguish between QTD (quarter-to-date), YTD (year-to-date), and cumulative (since inception) metrics.

6. Currency: Maintain currency notation. Some funds report in multiple currencies.

7. Dates: Format all dates as DD-MM-YYYY.

8. Confidentiality: Some company names may be redacted or coded. Extract as shown.

9. Multiple Records: Investment tables will have many rows - one per portfolio company. Extract each company as a separate record.

10. Relationships: Use foreign keys to link portfolio companies back to the fund and reporting period. Each investment record should reference the fund name and reporting period.
